mapper.insert: insert into qt_finacial_authentication_bank (id,bankCardNo, userName, identityNo,mobile) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update qt_finacial_authentication_base set bankCardNo =#{bankCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName =#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identityNo =#{identityNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, education, marriage, children, province_id, city_id, domain,liveTime qq, email from qt_finacial_authentication_base
select id, education, marriage, children, province_id,liveTime city_id, domain, qq, email from qt_finacial_authentication_base where id = #{value}
